ygData.subject: Slow load and zoning
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello - just joined this group. My son is very a very enthusiastic EQ player, but is constantly frustrated by the initial loading times (about 10 minutes) and
ygData.messageBody:
Hello - just joined this group.

My son is very a very enthusiastic EQ player, but is constantly
frustrated by the initial loading times (about 10 minutes) and in
particular time to go from one zone to the next - about five minutes
on average. Very often it crashes back to the server screen after a
long wait.

The PC is a PII 450 with 384Mb RAM and a 60GB hard disk, 90% of which
is free. The graphics card is a 16MB nVidia Riva TNT. Internet
connection is a fast 512Kbs ADSL.

Is this normal with EQ, and if not, how long should it take to load
and zone? What can be done to really speed things up?

Thanks.

Regards.
